title: Plugin Assembly
description: Plugin Assembly to register or update

name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name for the plugin assembly. Typically use the friendly name without spaces and invalid characters

friendlyName.title: Friendly Name
friendlyName.description: Friendly name for the plugin assembly, as will be displayed in the UI

solutionName.title: Solution Name
solutionName.description: Optional unique name of the solution to add this assembly to. Overrides top level manifest solution if provided

filePath.title: File Path
filePath.description: Relative or absolute path to the assembly dll

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.description: Array of the plugin classes included in the assembly to be registered
